com.cmpe275.controller

Class PlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmpe275.controller.PlayerController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/player")
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Player Controller to perform CRUD operations on Player.
    Author:
    arunabh.shrivastava, sagar.mane
    See Also:
    Player, PlayerService, PlayerServiceImpl, PlayerRepository

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> create(@RequestParam(value="firstname")
                                                                       java.lang.String firstname,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="lastname")
                                                                       java.lang.String lastname,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                       java.lang.String email,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="description",required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.String description,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="city",required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.String city,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="street",required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.String street,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="state",required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.String state,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="zip",required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.Integer zip,
                                                                       @RequestParam(value="sponsor",required=false)
                                                                       java.lang.Long sponsorId)
        Creates a new Player
        Parameters:
        firstname - First name of the player
        lastname - Last name of the player
        email - Email address of the player
        description - Description about the player
        city - City of the player address
        street - Street name and number of the player address
        state - State of the player address
        zip - Zip Code of the player address
        sponsorId - Sponsor id of the sponsor
        Returns:
        A Player object on success, or a HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST on invalid request

        Gets a Player
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the player
